original_title: VeggieTales: LarryBoy & the Fib from Outer Space!
overview: With his dad's bowling plate in pieces, Junior Asparagus has to think fast. But when his new friend encourages him to tell a little white lie, he finds that making a lie bigger and bigger can get you stuck in it.
tagline: "The name's Fibrilious Minimus! But you can call me Fib!"
title: VeggieTales: LarryBoy & the Fib from Outer Space!
